extendedInfo.description: The ultimate gift list organizer. Gift Pony makes Christmas shopping fun again!Try the limited version for free, upgrade for extra features.â¢ Works with your existing contactsâ¢ Attach photos from your cameraâ¢ Track your spendingâ¢ Barcode readerâ¢ Password protection (paid feature)â¢ Send lists by SMS or emailâ¢ Remember what you gave last yearâ¢ Icons for different occasionsâ¢ Share gifts between peopleâ¢ Add people without gifts, or gifts without peopleâ¢ Use as your personal wish listFree version supports up to 15 gifts. Purchase a one-off upgrade for unlimited gifts, password protection, backup/restore and more.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Couple suggestions. Make it so gIft amount can be exact and to the penny. Allow the app to be synced with other users who might be helping with shopping....like husbands?
reviews.author: Amanda Marcott Thottunkal

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful app, keeps a running total, easy to use, can send list easily via text/email etc but would be better if it didn\'t add \'to buy\' after every gift.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I researched &this is the best app I found it would be good to be able to mark items when gifting them as dates don\'t always line up for birthday mothers day etc
reviews.author: Elizabeth Williamson

reviews.title: Pretty good :)
reviews.comment: I like this app, but I\'m switching to a different one only because this one has a limited amount of how many gifts you can put on it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like this app, it\'s clear and easy to use. Delete is not obvious (have to hold down on name/item) but now that I know that, it does the job.
reviews.author: Selin O

reviews.title: Good app but paid version should offer more...
reviews.comment: Sort by occasion? you cany choose one or at least I can\'t.  Have to manually delete presents or delete person then re-add..great app but kinda wastes my money upgrading to paid version...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cross out feature?
reviews.comment: Is good but would rate higher if you were able to cross people off the list once done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Categories please
reviews.comment: Would have been better if people can be grouped/categorized i.e. Family, Officemates etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not accept cents in cost of item,  only dollars.
reviews.comment: Does not accept cents in the cost, just dollars.  I want an exact total of what I\'ve spent, not a rounded up total.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gift Pony
reviews.comment: Great app, any way you can add an option to set a budget per person?
reviews.author: Scott Firmin

reviews.title: Not worth buying
reviews.comment: Sucks you can only do 15 gifts. Not worth buying for $3. Can find other free apps that do the same thing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Having said that, I have suggestions to make this even better. Add a button to add gift from website,like amazon, and a gps location button to input what store the gift is at. Also one whine, why can\'t we input the gift amount to the penny? Keep up the great work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: List too small in free version
reviews.comment: This was exactly what I was looking for. Disappointed that the free version lets you have such a short list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Upgraded
reviews.comment: Seems to be waste of money I was not max out on gifts with free version. See nothing extra. Next year gift list will grow but someone may make a better app before then. This needs some more features to do much.
reviews.author: Aaron OConnor

reviews.title: Home page
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to get to (gifts,buy,bought,people) page without going <<<<<<<<<.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Brilliant app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app, poor edit options
reviews.comment: I want to edit and add After ive made it. If i wanna do that now i have to delete it and make a new one. Why cant we add a picture later on.  Make and EDIT button/option that work at all times. Before, during anf after a list make.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally...
reviews.comment: Finally found an app that\'s actually better than writing it down on paper. This is a very well designed product, and being able to see what I got everyone last year is a real bonus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really useful and well organized. Easy to see who to shop for and how much u are spending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No edit or delete options....rating 0
reviews.comment: Why make an app without standard features?
reviews.author: A Google User
